item.title: Testimonials and Subscribe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_section full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1476099350103{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text="TESTIMONIALS" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1476099386168{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]"In promotion and of advertising, a testimonial or show consists of a person's written or spoken statement extolling the virtue of a product." Mariani Wine, MaWine.co.uk[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]"Celebrity endorsements have proven very successful in China, where increasing consumerism makes the purchase of an endorsed product into a status symbol." Linda Kimpel,Â Kimo.no[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1476099562719{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-color: #3c3a8c !important;}"][vc_row equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_custom_heading text="SUBSCRIBE TO NEWSLETTER" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff" use_theme_fonts="yes" css=".vc_custom_1476099645110{padding-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column_text]Companies from the private sector have begun to offer testimonial verification services to help consumers verify the authenticity of displayed testimonials[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_btn title="Subscribe" style="outline" shape="square" align="center"][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]
